p: In Brazil, the Rutaceae family comprises about 38 genera and 22 species [ 13]. Citrus limonum (L.) comprises 3 species and various hybrids. Species of this genus are known to show monoterpenes and sesquiterpenes, such as limonene and Î±-pinene [ 14, 15]. Essential oils of this kind have been evaluated for presenting biological activities such as insecticide, cytotoxic, and antibacterial activities [ 16].
